Headline: Brown, Purple and Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown, Purple and Red Line trains are running with delays at Belmont due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown, Purple and Red Line trains are running with delays at Belmont due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Reroute near Blackhawk/North Ave
ShortDescription: 37 Sedgwick buses temp. rerouted NB: Sedgwick, Blackhawk, Larrabee, North Ave and Sedgwick; SB: Sedgwick, North Ave, Wells, Division and Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Blackhawk/North Ave, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Sedgwick, Blackhawk, Larrabee, North Ave and Sedgwick.

Southbound buses will operate via Sedgwick, North Ave, Wells, Division and Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 76th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Clark, Halsted and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Clark, Halsted and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Armitage and Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Armitage and Clark/Lake due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Armitage and Clark/Lake due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kimball and Armitage at this time.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area. Shuttle buses are available between Armitage and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Express Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Purple Line Express has been temporarily suspended due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Purple Line Express has been temporarily suspended due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
